about.description: The CADET software is a fast and accurate solver for a comprehensive model family. Typical applications include (but are not limited to) chromatography, filtration, crystallization, and fermentation. CADET can handle arbitrary sequences and networks of unit operations, including reactors, tanks, tubes, pumps, valves, detectors, etc. The resulting models are solved with state-of-the-art mathematical algorithms and scientific computing techniques.
about.summary: An open platform for integrated process modelling and simulation

name: cadet

about.description: The CADET software is a fast and accurate solver for a comprehensive model family. Typical applications include (but are not limited to) chromatography, filtration, crystallization, and fermentation. CADET can handle arbitrary sequences and networks of unit operations, including reactors, tanks, tubes, pumps, valves, detectors, etc. The resulting models are solved with state-of-the-art mathematical algorithms and scientific computing techniques.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "CADET" %}
{% set version = "4.4.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/modsim/{{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 838ce6c3176038aa7776fcf1fd7427795870833613b6a0a9203dd5a0296299ee

build:
  number: 1

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - git
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.17  # [linux64]
    - cmake
    - make  # [unix]
  host:
    - superlu  # [not win]
    - suitesparse
    - tbb-devel
    - hdf5
    - libblas
    - libcblas
    - liblapack
  run:
    - superlu  # [not win]
    - suitesparse
    - tbb-devel
    - hdf5
    - __osx >={{ MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET|default("10.9") }}  # [osx and x86_64]

about:
  home: https://github.com/modsim/cadet
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'An open platform for integrated process modelling and simulation'
  description: The CADET software is a fast and accurate solver for a comprehensive model family. Typical applications include (but are not limited to) chromatography, filtration, crystallization, and fermentation. CADET can handle arbitrary sequences and networks of unit operations, including reactors, tanks, tubes, pumps, valves, detectors, etc. The resulting models are solved with state-of-the-art mathematical algorithms and scientific computing techniques.
  doc_url: https://cadet.github.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/modsim/cadet

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jayghoshter
    - jazib-hassan-juelich
    - schmoelder
